properties.areaDesc: James River from James River Bridge to Hampton Roads Bridge-Tunnel
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 27 at 3:34AM EST until January 28 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 15 to 20 kt and waves around 2 ft
expected.

* WHERE...James River from James River Bridge to Hampton Roads
Bridge-Tunnel.

* WHEN...From 4 AM to 10 AM EST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 10 AM EST TUESDAY
